metadata.title: CVE-2019-5820 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in PDFium in Google Chrome prior to 74.0.3729.108 alloweda remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted PDFfile.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
